flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

lines.text: Lay the frame on it's side.
lines.text_raw: Lay the frame on it's side.

lines.text: Protect the cylinder and press feet so that when you weld, spatter won't stick. You could use some piece of metal or a nonflammable cloth.
lines.text_raw: Protect the cylinder and press feet so that when you weld, spatter won't stick. You could use some piece of metal or a nonflammable cloth.

lines.text: On the inside, bottom edge, weld the interior of the spacer inwards as far as you can. This should be an inch or more. Do this in all 4 corners accessable from this side of the frame. See the photo.
lines.text_raw: On the inside, bottom edge, weld the interior of the spacer inwards as far as you can. This should be an inch or more. Do this in all 4 corners accessable from this side of the frame. See the photo.

lines.text: Weld the top 100%, and grind it flush.
lines.text_raw: Weld the top 100%, and grind it flush.

lines.text: Weld this side as you did the other side, also welding inside the spacers.
lines.text_raw: Weld this side as you did the other side, also welding inside the spacers.
